DeBank: 1/6
Ready to finally meet with your long-awaited DeBank XP? Let it witness your on-chain journey, and boost with DeBank!
Snapshot was taken at 0:00, July 4th (UTC+0). All active addresses have the chance to claim an initial XP airdrop. Check it now!
👉 https://debank.com/xp

Earn 2.5x on your sUSDe yield when ETH goes up, preserve your sUSDe yield when ETH is flat.
Deposit now → http://lyra.finance/yield/susdebull

articles.description:
I think it's fair to say:
Blast farmers did very well here. 
Large allocation and decent float as well.
BLUR traders and holders got pretty rekt getting a tiny allocation and provided liquidity on NFTs that went down or holding $BLUR which went down as well.

$BLUR stakers will receive 3%.

Top wallets will be vesting their airdrop.
